data.eml:eml: Three new species of the millipede genus Tylopus Jeekel, 1968 from Thailand, with additional notes on the species described by Attems (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Likhitrakarn, Natdanai, Golovatch, Sergei I., Panha, Somsak (2014): Three new species of the millipede genus Tylopus Jeekel, 1968 from Thailand, with additional notes on the species described by Attems (Diplopoda, Polydesmida, Paradoxosomatidae). ZooKeys 435: 63-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.435.8286, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.435.8286
